title: Laurell K. Hamilton's Anita Blake, Vampire Hunter: The Laughing Corpse,  Volume 1: Animator
description: What would you do for a million dollars? Would you resurrect a two-and-one-half-century old corpse? Harold Gaynor poses just that question to Animator and part-time vampire hunter, Anita Blake... Plus, some crime scenes are even too horrible for a vampire slayer, and the worse they are, the more questions they raise.
author: Laurell K. Hamilton
